---
title: "Quarto-font-ligatures Example"
filters:
  - quarto-font-ligatures
---

This filter adds a font-ligature mechanism.

Currently supported characters are:

- `=>` : =>

- `->` : ->

- `-->` : -->

- `==>` : ==>

- `<-` : <-

- `<--` : <--

- `<=` : <=

- `<==` : <==

- `<->` : <->

- `<=>` : <=>

- `<-->` : <-->

- `<==>` : <==>

- `!=` : !=

- `>=` : >=

- `=<` : =<
